Meta.title: Panda's Elonaplus Hook Claw Mod
Meta.author: Now Happy Panda
Meta.description: Added shield item Hook Claw from Elonaplus Hook Claw is Shield type item that add it's damage and to hit bonus to all melee and ranged weapons Allow multi hits when multi wielding Hook Claws, scale with Martial Arts and Dual Wield skills Premission gotten from zwa73 aka Sosarciel
